result.title: Keurig Dr Pepper downgraded by analysts amid split uncertainty
result.text: Keurig Dr Pepper Inc (NASDAQ:KDP) has been downgraded to a Hold' rating by Jefferies analysts, who cited uncertainties around the planned split with JDE Peet'sand potential integration risks associated with the combined businesses. The broker noted that while both New BevCo and Global CoffeeCo are capable of delivering top-line and EBIT growth in 2026 and 2027, the scale of the merger, a heavy debt load, coffee price volatility, and the company's new financing structure with KKR and Apollo may hinder the direction of travel.
